default.title: Sorry, something went wrong
default.message: A server exception occurred. Please try again.

session.title: Sorry, you'll have to start again
session.message: You haven't entered any details for 30 minutes, so we have cleared your information to keep it secure.

cookies-required.title: Cookies are required to use this service
cookies-required.message:
Cookies are required in order to use this service.

Please enable cookies and try again. Find out how to we use cookies.

ddos-rate-limit.message: You have submitted too many requests in quick succession.

submission-rate-limit.message: You have submitted too many applications in a short space of time.
